str2: Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: From a variation of genos; to procreate; figuratively, to regenerate.
Language, speech, conversation, manner of speaking. From dialegomai; a discourse, i.e. 'dialect'.
